instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to the top of /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors (primary: #0066FF, secondary: #FF6600) and fonts (Outfit, Inter).
3. USE SHADCN: Utilize the existing components in /app/frontend/src/components/ui/. They are .jsx files.
4. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js for pages and logic, but .jsx is acceptable for components if that is the project pattern. The existing UI components are .jsx.
5. LAYOUT: Implement a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Header, and wraps the page content.
6. AUTH: Create a 'ProtectedLayout' for routes requiring login.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.
8. THEME: Default to Light Mode. Use the 'dark' class for dark mode if implemented, but focus on a polished Light Mode first.
9. PDF: Use 'jspdf' and 'jspdf-autotable' for client-side invoice generation.
10. NOTIFICATIONS: Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (already in ui components).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use generous spacing (p-6, p-8).
Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large hero title.
Ensure high contrast for text. No gray-on-gray.
